content: अवनतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Bending, bowing down, stooping; अवनतिमवनेः <ls>Mu. 1. 2</ls>, <ls n="Mu.">3. 8</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 8.</ls> {@--2@} Declining in the west, setting; <ls>Śi. 9. 8.</ls> {@--3@} A bow, prostration. {@--4@} Bending (as a bow); धनुषामवनतिः <ls>K.</ls> (where अ° also means ‘stooping’). {@--5@} Modesty, absence of insolence, humility.
